trans-unit.source: A composite activity that contains a collection of event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Uma atividade composta que contém uma coleção de processadores de eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is typically used where a collection of events must be handled.
trans-unit.target: É normalmente utilizado em que uma coleção de eventos deve ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Each event is handled by one <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref>, which is part of EventHandlersActivity.
trans-unit.target: Cada evento é processado por um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref>, que faz parte de EventHandlersActivity.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The EventHandlersActivity activity holds a set of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> classes, for use by the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]A atividade de EventHandlersActivity contém um conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>classes, para utilização por <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associados</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: An EventHandlersActivity activity can only be associated with an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlingScopeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Uma atividade EventHandlersActivity só pode ser associada a um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlingScopeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlingScopeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The EventHandlersActivity activity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the EventHandlersActivity activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: A atividade de EventHandlersActivity é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que a atividade de EventHandlersActivity pode conter outras atividades.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity"></xref> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity"> </xref> classe utilizando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo utilizador da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently executing instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância atualmente em execução do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The currently executing instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A instância atualmente em execução do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: childactivity is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: childactivityé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the childactivity.
trans-unit.target: As atividades executável não contêm o childactivity .
